perlevel.eventCount: Number of events in the given level
perlevel.durationInSecs: Time (in seconds) spent on the given level
perlevel.stampRotateCount: Number of stamp rotate events in the level
perlevel.singleRotateCount: Number of single rotation events in the level
perlevel.moleculeMoveCount: Number of molecule move events in the level
perlevel.clearBtnPresses: Number of times the clear button was pressed in the level
perlevel.avgMoleculeDragDurationInSecs: The average number of seconds each drag took, over the given level
perlevel.finalScore: The final score the player received for this level
perlevel.completesCount: The number of completion events in the level

answerGiven.desc: The answer the user gave to a given question (or -1 if unanswered)

wasCorrect.desc: 0 if user answered the question incorrectly, 1 if answered correctly, -1 if unanswered

aggregate.sessionID: The player's session ID number for this play session
aggregate.persistentSessionID: The session ID for the player's device, persists across multiple players using the same device.
aggregate.sessionEventCount: The total number of events across the entire session
aggregate.sessionDurationInSecs: The total time (in seconds) spent over the entire session
aggregate.sessionStampRotateCount: Total number of stamp rotation events over the session
aggregate.sessionSingleRotateCount: Total number of single rotation events over the session
aggregate.sessionMoleculeMoveCount: Total number of molecule move events over the session
aggregate.sessionClearBtnPresses: Total number of times the clear button was pressed during the session
aggregate.sessionMuseumDurationInSecs: Total amount of time spent in a museum during the session?

db_columns.app_id: A string identifying which game from which the event came
db_columns.app_id_fast: Um... another version of the app id?
db_columns.app_version: The version of the game from which the event came
db_columns.session_id: Unique identifier for the gameplay session
db_columns.persistent_session_id: Unique identifier across all gameplay sessions from a single computer
db_columns.level: The game level in which the event was logged
db_columns.event_custom: Um... this appears to be unused?
db_columns.event_data_simple: Um, this also seems to be unused?
db_columns.event_data_complex: event-specific data encoded as a JSON string
db_columns.client_time: The client machine time when the event was generated
db_columns.client_time_ms: Client time in milliseconds? Or something?
db_columns.server_time: The server machine time when the event was logged
db_columns.session_n: Session number, maybe? Not really sure what n means here...
db_columns.http_user_agent: Data on the type of web browser, OS, etc. in use by the player
